website_summaries.verdict: A premier name in cartography creates a map with 3D shading that gives depth to terrain and oceans, paired with up-to-date destinations and political boundaries.
pros: easy to find and read places of interest and those with loved ones in the military use it to keep track of deployments
Good size for framing, which can preserve its longevity
Users like the level of detail in countries and cities
cons: Since this map is not laminated, cannot write on like other versions
This model is folded vs. rolled

customer_reviews.title: The world on your wall
customer_reviews.text: I don't get out much, so I never knew there were so many places. This picture lets me see all these places they say exist. One nice thing, it confirmed that B.S. about the world being all round and sh*t. I knew that was a line of B.S. the moment I heard that pervie teacher tell me back in school. A damn fool can see right here the world is FLAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map so the grandkids could learn a little bit about our planet. Put it on the wall at their level and they ask questions like, "Where are we?" and "What country is this?" "How come some are so small and others so big?" It got their curiosity piqued which is exactly the reason I bought it. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: favorite buy
customer_reviews.text: one of my favorite buys. while my son was deployed we could follow him on this map. we even added pictures of him when he would port. till sitting out and my son has been home for 2 months. #gonavy
customer_reviews.author: Richelle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Travel junkie
customer_reviews.text: The map is exactly as it says it supposed to be. I wish it was fully laminate where as it would not be susceptible to tears or rips. However if you’re careful with it and you know are you going to hang it on your wall or if you’re going to frame it it’s very simple to work with and it’s a nice quality map.
customer_reviews.author: Mr_Cozmik

customer_reviews.title: Comes folded with crease marks.
customer_reviews.text: Comes folded up, not rolled. Can't get the creases out so it look super lame.
customer_reviews.author: S. G. Rockefeller

customer_reviews.title: I love this map!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this world map because I wanted to keep tract of the earthquakes that are happening all over the world. Whether there are small ones or big ones. I just need to get this in a frame with a cork background. This would be great in the classroom too!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen V.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable!
customer_reviews.text: Got the map for my kiddo! Map itself is well laid out and key geographic locations are clearly marked out. it is easy to spot the capital for each country as it is denoted by a * beside it. My only gripe is that the map came torn at one of the folds. Definitely did not expect that. I've put some tape on the back for now. Also, it is best to put the map on a wall or someplace. Repeated folding and infolding will almost certainly result in a tear, easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kaanthi B.

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality map
customer_reviews.text: This map is very high quality and beautiful. Unfortunately for me my mail carrier is a JERK and always scrunches my mail into my tiny apartment mailbox. He damaged my map and I thought by hanging it I could smooth it out, but it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: vanidosa27

customer_reviews.title: World Map.
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I wanted and needed. My grandson is taking world geography this semester. With the online learning I thought he needed a real map so he could get a better idea of the world he would be studying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very thin , Not worthy
customer_reviews.text: This map is thin and the words are not bold and it is bit difficult for kids to read . Even the quality lamination paper is not good, not sturdy map , the thickness is not good . You can see in the picture I attached.Main thing is it is very expensive for this price.
customer_reviews.author: keerthi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our son when realized he was struggling with geography and they are made well. They have actually helped him to have these to look at when he has a question.
customer_reviews.author: Katzmeow71

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read, works as needed
customer_reviews.text: Hung in our home to just be able to visually see the world's geography. Came in safe packaging to prevent any tears or rips during shipping. Great and inexpensive product
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Small size
customer_reviews.text: The map was a bit difficult to read, however we use it to help solve crossword puzzle questions and it is fine for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Eden

customer_reviews.title: Get it laminated and it is perfect
customer_reviews.text: You can see the lines of the fold but I had mine laminated and put on backing board. Works great - Get it laminated and use Dry Erase pens to mark the travels you've taken together or want to go.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived it was folded not rolled. In the center, right along the fold it was close to being torn. But... for the price and for what I needed it for, it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and printed on sturdy paper. Only negative is that if you buy the one that’s not laminated and comes folded then expect some creases on some countries. Great for educational purposes and for reminding yourself where in the world places are :)
customer_reviews.author: Josh K

customer_reviews.title: Good map
customer_reviews.text: I measured my wallspace and ordered what I thought was tbe right size. It was huge and had a wide border. My mistake. It's a good map, just too big.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - High quality. Helped me plan a backpacking trip through Europe
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. High quality. Great price. I put this up in my office to help plan a backpacking trip through Europe. It was beautifully motivating, and detailed enough to help me plan my four-week backpacking trip through western Europe.
customer_reviews.author: C Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Broken at the fold seam
customer_reviews.text: The map is okay in term of printing quality. The biggest issue is the it is folded, so it is broken on the folded part, where words can be read and white paper is displayed. I highly recommend the rolled paper one if price is not a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but too creased
customer_reviews.text: As a 50th Anniversary gift, I was making a 24x36 map bulletin board on which the couple can chart their travels. The size and colorcwere perfect, but I had trouble getting it to lie flat. I even tried ironing the creases out, but they were too permanent.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Morse

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful map
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful map of the world came quicker than expected. Will look great framed on my wall. Reminds me there is so much more out there I haven't seen or been and just inspires me to travel. Easy to ready, gets value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: BAD MAP: Distorted and incorrect; Greenland is shown as being twice the size of Australia; WRONG!!
customer_reviews.text: - in reality, Australia is about 3.6 times bigger than Greenland - Other issues include: - Size of Alaska, - India and - South America. - Type is tiny and there are numerous inaccuracies.
customer_reviews.author: artiswork

customer_reviews.title: Good value for educational tools
customer_reviews.text: My son loves naming off different countries and flag books, he loves this poster. I bought the folded one for 10 bucks because I honestly don't give a crud about having some lines in it. Slapped 4 tacks in the corners boom. We're enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: vamosalaplaya87

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big but not too big.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how thick the paper was. Also, I can read everything well and It comes folded so you don't have to make your own creases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted at a great price point.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size folded for reviewing and verifying locations of places in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MAP!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Now I can see the whole world! Sturdy, Colorful, Large. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Vagabond

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Hung it on the wall for the kids and it looks good. I ordered the folded version so it has some big creases, but that doesn’t bother me
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: We love looking at this map, we keep it where we can see it while we eat. It creates a lot of good conversations with my three kids ages 5-11.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R.

customer_reviews.title: Great size. High quality
customer_reviews.text: We have this in the Master bedroom to remind us what countries we still need to visit.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ancheta

customer_reviews.title: Okay product but Not worth $10
customer_reviews.text: You can get same quality at dollar store for $1. Price is too much.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Maps are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Great little man I got into document on my travels hanging on the wall love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer david tony

customer_reviews.title: Arrived folded
customer_reviews.text: Recommend shipping these rolled in a tube. Folding creates unwanted creases. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Trip

customer_reviews.title: thinkORANGE / LSAT / Bob and Bezos - Comics & Coffee Shops
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this map for a business strategy for 4 of my organizations.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Rees, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: What I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I operate & design the menu for a 2 restaurant operation that focuses on global cuisine. I purchased this to help determine the next region I would like to focus on for the next seasonal menu.
customer_reviews.author: Snowcook

customer_reviews.title: Okay oroduct
customer_reviews.text: It is not as well defined as other maps I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Madi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as stated
customer_reviews.text: Just as explained, we're hanging up in our kids room so they can learn by walking by..
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Leininger

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted to decorate my wall. It's huge, easy to read and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Khadine Greaves

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong map twice, never the correct one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the world map. I received the U.S. I emailed and was told I would receive the world map. I then received a U. S. map again. The quality of the map seems fine, nevertheless I did not order a U. S. map. Very disappointed, won’t order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Folded is not good!
customer_reviews.text: Good sized map and has even the little islands fairly visible. However, the corner folds are not good at all and lowers the ability to see text.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: Used it to locate countries in the news. Used it for fun and educationof kids
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I would try a different one next time.
customer_reviews.text: This was sealed up, yet all the folded creases look so worn. Nicaragua is not even ledgable because it's shredded at the seem! This was a gift from 'Santa' so I can't even return it because my kids will be like, "what the heck!?" So I'm stuck with a ruined map.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Pratt

customer_reviews.title: I love this map itself
customer_reviews.text: I love this map itself. It is very nice and easy to read. The only thing I did not like about the map is that I put it in a poster frame to hang on my wall. It has a lot of creases where the map was folded. I think it would have been a lot better if the map was rolled up and shipped that way. Even in the frame the creases are visible. Other than that, no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Matt KY

customer_reviews.title: Item is as described and sturdy too!
customer_reviews.text: Came folded up and on-time. I was sort of expecting it to come as a roll but that wasn't important to me. Looks and feels like quality and I fully expect it to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: OhLongJohnson

customer_reviews.title: More like something for an elementary school
customer_reviews.text: It was glossy and not that interesting to look at. More like something for an elementary school classroom
customer_reviews.author: Luvin Dear

customer_reviews.title: nice but folded
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, attractive map. It is folded but that was included in the description. I'm using this for a teaching backdrop.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Great map. Clear
customer_reviews.text: Great map. Clear, clean, simple. Good price! Some of the smaller islands do not appear, e.g. Turks and Caicos, but if those don't matter to you, then it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not world map
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the world map but received US map. Received a replacement and was still US map.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice map
customer_reviews.text: Helps grand kids visualize when we talk about where relatives live or where they've been
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought to display my successful travel destinations. along with a box od map pins and a roll of cork for backing, it does exactly what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: lovetotravel

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Product was a gift but it hasn’t ripped and it is very informative.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Geography Curiosity
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully simple Invitation for initially creating interest and wonder in the novel geographers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came as described
customer_reviews.text: map come folded but i just laid mines out overnight to smooth out the lines. Plus i will have laminated at school so im sure i will get tons of use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Buy bigger map
customer_reviews.text: Others stated when they were folded. This is folded. Advice. Buy bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT MAP... AND I FRAMED IT AND IT WORKED PERFECTLY.. QUALITY.... NOT A CHEAPY MAP
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R. Barrow

customer_reviews.title: great map
customer_reviews.text: it's nice that this comes in a square (not rolled up in a tube). This is a great map!
customer_reviews.author: DK1968

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere, not detailed small print
customer_reviews.text: Print is a bit small, not highly detailed. Look elsewhere for a better quality map.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good Product next time I will buy the larger size
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT E THOMPSON JR

customer_reviews.title: Good map
customer_reviews.text: Nice map, good printing, however still a lot of big cities are not showing.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great overall map of our world today. Gave to my Dad! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Still a great map, and if not planning on displaying it ...
customer_reviews.text: Map is high quality, but hard for my 89 year old mom to read. Still a great map, and if not planning on displaying it permanently (so not wanting creases) it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good print map
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and good print map. My wife will go to travel those countries one by one in her whole life, hopefully we will make it successfully.
customer_reviews.author: Travis W

customer_reviews.title: Okay map
customer_reviews.text: This map looks like it’s been folded and unfolded a number of times. I’ve purchased maps the same size and folded as well from the dollar tree with better quality. But it will do for what I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Folds impede the map
customer_reviews.text: Except for the folds, it's great. Damaged where the folds are.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Good map, but came with a couple of tears.
customer_reviews.text: The map came with one of the corners stuck to another corner and it tore a little upon opening. It also had a small tear along the seam of one of the other folded lines. I thought about laminating it to prevent further tearing, but then you get into a storage issue.
customer_reviews.author: Preston H

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's huge! But you will learn your geography this way for sure folks! You will need a poster frame for it, most likey.
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find for price
customer_reviews.text: Glossy full of color reasonably-sized world map at this price is a find. Came in good time and quality paper and brilliant color. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Jan Michael Nace

customer_reviews.title: Everything was amazing, except the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about the map except for how it arrived. It was folded up in like 5 different ways, and then folded some more into my mailbox, which makes for a very creased poster. Kinda disappointed, I'm hoping it flattens out soon. But, I mean, come on! You roll posters! You don't fold them!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes wish it were larger, but this is handy for quick reference.
customer_reviews.author: jimjays

customer_reviews.title: Great map
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does exactly what I wanted to do. I really loved that there is so much details for cities and countries around the world. Decent price.
customer_reviews.author: J. considine

customer_reviews.title: Not in Pristine condition
customer_reviews.text: These maps arrive folded, multiple creasing, Not a pristine map.
customer_reviews.author: eddiekirk

customer_reviews.title: Clear printing and colors.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad who wanted a world map up on the wall at his apartment. Helps him keep the international news straight. Big enough, not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Tenney

customer_reviews.title: map
customer_reviews.text: bought for my 8 yr old granddaughter, who wanted to see the world on a map, very nice product she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only a US map
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a world map this is not for you. All I received was a map of the United States. While it is good quality, the item is misrepresented. Very disappointed as I wanted it for a New Years activity
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Maurer

customer_reviews.title: It is well made but over the price
customer_reviews.text: The map is well printed except the paper is so thin that it is easy to be tear.
customer_reviews.author: Miao Yu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful map
customer_reviews.text: Love the map and it arrived when it said it would! I used it in a Missions Board for church. Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lois McMurchy

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy folded maps.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map to frame and hang in my family room. However, when I unfolded it, it ripped in the crease. I'm very disappointed and regret not ordering a map that was rolled and not folded.
customer_reviews.author: Camille E. Hlinko

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect to keep track of travel with some pins

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Map
customer_reviews.text: I received a map of the United States, not a World Map

customer_reviews.title: Good 9$ Map
customer_reviews.text: Well, I ordered this map because I want to hang it on my wall and it’s good just as expected, it’s folded but I think the folding marks will disapear. The colors are good and also the font.
customer_reviews.author: Raghad

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great map to mark whatever you may desire!
customer_reviews.author: Ebonee Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly printed map but... over creased and not laminated. Kept it anyways
customer_reviews.author: Fikes

customer_reviews.title: Laminated one is better!!
customer_reviews.text: The paper print is very delicate. Need to purchase a foam board to push pin it on to it and then stick it on to the wall. I recommend to just the laminated on which is some extra bucks what can be a wiser decision.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great world map!
customer_reviews.text: Love this world map! It is large and has a protective cover.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Andrusyk

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have it in my room and put push pins to the places I’ve visited and it’s amazing.

customer_reviews.title: Best map I could find for readability (many are difficult)
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter to study the country locations. Best map I could find for readability (many are difficult).

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED BY THE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: WISH I HAD READ THE OTHER ONE STAR REVIEWS EARLIER.....DISAPPOINTED BY THE QUALITY. AND IT IS NOT 3D AS I EXPECTED......DOSN'T WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyrle

customer_reviews.title: Great Map of the World
customer_reviews.text: I like the two sided idea. I got this to see how big of a place the world really is-amazing and how big and great the U.S.A. is. Also to look at all the places I can or can't visit!

customer_reviews.title: Very clear and it arrived to my house fast.

customer_reviews.title: To my knowledge it is a good map.
customer_reviews.text: Wish they sold slightly bigger maps of this quality and kind.

customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality and overpriced. I returned it as I found a better quality maps that would last much longer. I don't like that this was folded.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but Came torn at corners
customer_reviews.text: The map is great but it came torn at all the edges. I put a stick tape at 12 places and using it to avoid hassle of returning.

customer_reviews.title: excellent World map
